ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Stalking Probe
ygData.msgSnippet: You can use either a toolbox or a deluxe tool box... triple check your recipe and try again.  Maybe they broke it with the last patch, /shrug Gazamel Ayonae Ro
ygData.messageBody:
You can use either a toolbox or a deluxe tool box...
triple check your recipe and try again. Maybe they
broke it with the last patch, /shrug

Gazamel
Ayonae Ro
